verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%> I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3050>Yahweh<s%> with my whole <S%H3824>heart,<s%> in the <S%H5475>council<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright,<s%> and in the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4639>works<s%> are <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H1875>pondered<s%> by all those who delight in <S%H2656>them.<s%>
He has <S%H6213>caused<s%> his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to be <S%H2143>remembered.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful.<s%>
He has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2964>food<s%> to those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H5769>him.<s%> He always <S%H2142>remembers<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
He has <S%H5046>shown<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H3581>power<s%> of his <S%H4639>works,<s%> in <S%H5414>giving<s%> them the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
The <S%H4639>works<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H4941>justice.<s%> All his <S%H6490>precepts<s%> are <S%H539>sure.<s%>
They are <S%H5564>established<s%> <S%H5703>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%> They are <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H3477>uprightness.<s%>

He has <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H6304>redemption<s%> to his <S%H5971>people.<s%> He has <S%H6680>ordained<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H6918>holy<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome!<s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> All those who <S%H6213>do<s%> his work have a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding.<s%> His <S%H8416>praise<s%> <S%H5975>endures<s%> <S%H5703>forever!<s%>
